description:
As a Kestrel Engine
  I want to hunt for posts and content management functionality bugs
  So I can ensure proper content categorization and retrieval

steps.name: Given  Kestrel API client is armed with credentials
When  I hunt for all available tags via GET /tag
Then  the hunt should return status 200
And  response should contain user data array
And  user data structure should be consistent
And  each user profile should have required fields
